identificationModule.briefTitle: Digital Community to Improve Health in Rural Areas
identificationModule.officialTitle: Digital, Community-Led, Social Action Initiative to Reduce Opioid Vulnerability and HIV/HCV in Rural Areas of the Midwest and Appalachia

descriptionModule.briefSummary: The study is a cluster randomized controlled trial developed in counties located in Appalachia and the Midwest. We will prioritize counties from states with high risk for HIV and HCV infection associated with injection drug use.
descriptionModule.detailedDescription: The study will randomize clusters with groups of participants to an intervention or a standard of care condition.

designInfo.interventionModelDescription: Clusters will be randomized to either the intervention or the standard of care.

maskingInfo.maskingDescription: The outcomes assessor will be unaware of the experimental condition.

armGroups.label: Virtual Community Intervention
armGroups.description: Participants will participate in an online community with structured sessions as well as the ability to communicate freely with others.

armGroups.label: Standard of Care
armGroups.description: Participants will be exposed to what's disseminated within their communities

interventions.name: Virtual Community Intervention
interventions.description: Modules of community building, HIV/HCV prevention, drug and service stigma, identification of mental health problems

interventions.name: Standard of Care
interventions.description: health websites and county information provided to participants

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Lives in target zip codes
* Half not using illicit substances (not including marijuana) currently or in the past
* Half using illicit substances (not including marijuana) currently or in the past

Exclusion Criteria:

* Under the age of 18
* Not in target zip codes
